HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content:
Call of Duty: Zombies Pack has been updated to Version 1.3 |Added the Mystery Box! Try you chances to get a powerful weapon! odds are not in your favour. Credits: Danimineiro for making the C# code necessary.
Changes: New sounds for crafting at a Der Wunderfizz and at a Pack a Punch Buying Perk Colas now take 120 ticks (from 50) (2 seconds) Pack a punching now takes 220 tick (from 5000) (3.6 seconds)
|Thank you for playing!
